content: अभिचर् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To act wrongly towards any one, offend, trespass; तत्र विराधदनुकबंधप्रभृतयः केप्यभिचरंतीति श्रुतं <ls>Mv. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To be faithless (as wife or husband); पतिं या नाभिचरति मनोवाग्देहसंयता <ls>Ms. 5. 165</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 102.</ls> {@--3@} To charm, conjure, exorcise (by spells or incantations), employ spells for magical purposes &c.; वृष्ट्यायुः पुष्टिकामो वा तथैवाभिचरन्नपि <ls>Y. 1. 295</ls>; <ls n="Y.">3. 289.</ls> {@--4@} To possess, occupy.
